United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


Nos. 01-1928
     01-2497

                        GOYA FOODS, INC.,
                      Petitioner, Appellee,

                               v.

                 WALLACK MANAGEMENT CO. ET AL.,
                    Respondents, Appellants.


                          ERRATA SHEET
     The opinion of this Court issued on May 17, 2002 is
corrected as follows:
     On page 9, line 10, replace $4,6000,000 with $4,600,000.
